docs.title: A Second Chance, A New Beginning
docs.text: Jacob’s House is a structured sober living program designed to help individuals rebuild their lives after addiction. We offer a tiered housing model that meets residents where they are in their recovery journey and guides them toward independence.

docs.title: Why Choose Jacob’s House?
docs.text:
• Structure and Accountability: A clear path to recovery and reintegration.
  • Empathy-Driven Support: Founded by someone with lived experience in recovery.
  • Community and Growth: A safe place to build trust, skills, and a brighter future.

docs.title: Transition Housing
docs.text: A highly structured environment focusing on recovery and job readiness. Residents participate in mandatory meetings and follow strict rules for stability.

docs.title: Sober Living
docs.text: Moderated structure with curfews, chores, and peer accountability. Ideal for those transitioning to greater independence.

docs.title: Advanced Living
docs.text: Minimal rules with peer voting and self-management for residents demonstrating sustained progress.

docs.title: Milestones Achieved
docs.text:
• 45+ lives changed: Over 4 years, Jacob’s House has helped individuals rebuild with long-term sobriety and stability.
  • Safe, structured environment: Ensuring growth and transformation for all residents.
  • Expanding our mission: Future plans include housing for women and children.

docs.title: Ready to Begin Your Journey?
docs.text:
Jacob’s House is here to guide you every step of the way. Whether you're starting fresh or looking for a supportive community, we offer a safe place to grow and thrive.

Join the Program
